title: Hold on Rito. Why did you remove this glorious homeguard animation for Eve?!

replies.body:
That is actually ridiculous.

I love it.

I don't think Riot will bring this back because it doesn't fit her character. She's this evel sexy demon monster and when the first impression ingame is a cartoon animation, it really doesn't deliver.

But here's a suggestion instead:
If Evelynn uses the 'joke' emote on the fountain, she gets this animation. This way, you can keep the meme alive while still delivering on her theme.

(I came up with this idea by comparing her in my mind to Vel'koz how he could've had such a walk too, and then it made me think of his "oh darn" emote. It's nice to have a funny animation possible on even a supposedly cool/scary champ, but it shouldn't be part of the standard play pattern. Hence my suggestion. Make it possible, just not happening every game.)
Just let her toggle it like with the toggle button like the dongers swagger walk
But didn't they break his swag walk when they changed his passive? or did that get fixed?
Its interaction with the passive is very weird but he can still toggle between them by emoting.

> [{quoted}](name=needHymn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ojpjB4Kr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-18T06:23:05.972+0000)
>
> Because her lashers aren't supposed to be flippers.

She was obviously trying to seduce a duck.

Who could blame her? Drakes are handsome creatures
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
she should take teleport there are ducks in the river
It takes ~~a lot ~~  too much effort to move like this in flippers apparently.
Now If I saw this running to me I WOULD be scared. 10/10 fantasy fullfillment.
I wish the game had more silliness like this going, it is a video game after all bring in the fun. Stop being serious all the time.

I'm dying. This is even better than Heimer's head-rocket.

Bring it back. Rito plz
BRING IT BACK PLEASE :D
https://ih0.redbubble.net/image.32562860.9057/flat,800x800,070,f.jpg
I want this and I demand that the Benny Hill music play while occurring.

I had that running in my mind seeing this.

Rito, plz. This needs to happen. You could make a legendary skin where it's just her default skin but it has this animation with that theme, and I promise you it'd sell like crazy.
April Fools Urfelynn confirmed?
https://i.makeagif.com/media/5-27-2015/PAiYGO.gif
{{champion:19}}
This is so ridiculously funny.
rito plz we need this
I knew they'd eventually put Sonic in the game

This Definitely needs to stay this is the best thing ever
(insert roadrunner gif)
I bet it would be really hard to move like that in heels
This looks so stupid.
MEEP MEEP

I must go! My people need me!

*flapaflapaflapaflapaflapaflapa*
I don;t like it
ur 2 slo {{champion:33}}
For real though, that's horrifying
Is it just me or does that animation look like sonic's super peel out?
Wish this was included in a future skin or something.
GOTTA GO FAST!
I nearly died laughing
its cause you cant see her ass that well this way i think
Omg that's awesome
What the duck....
This was mentioned in meddlers recent thoughts thread as something they'd like to include somehow as an easter egg, but isn't reasonable to include as the standard homeguard animation.
They referred to this thread, so this is probably where they got the idea from. I'm glad I hijacked the top comment to make my suggestion here :) Seems like it worked.

This is the best thing ever.
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

GUYS! A THING! "Eve Homeguard Anim
No promises, but we're looking at potential ways to include the previous Eve Homeguard animation (link below to a video) as a hidden easter egg somehow. It's not the right fit for her primary Homeguard anim, might be able to get it in in some way though."
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/VMljLFJN-quick-gameplay-thoughts-october-20
I seen some carry shit in league, BUT THIS IS JUST PURE HORROR
This will be the animation for when cancer yordle wizard uses w on her.

If this doesn't get brought back for her, then maybe an April Fools skin...

Except this is how she normal-walks.
